SEARCH
Package com.example.lotteryevent.data

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryevent.data.Event
public class Event extends Object
Represents a single event in the lottery system. This class is a Plain Old Java Object (POJO) used for mapping Firestore documents.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event()
      A public no-argument constructor is required for Firestore deserialization.

    • Event

      public Event(String name, String description, String organizerId, String organizerName, Integer capacity)
      Constructs a new Event with essential details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the event.
      description - A short description of the event.
      organizerId - The ID of the user who organized the event.
      organizerName - The name of the user who organized the event.
      capacity - The maximum number of attendees for the event.
